page.title: 08 Living In Milton Keynes
page.content: The year is 1985 , my name is Claire Cassidy. There are a lot of thing to do in your spare time in Milton Keynes which is a good thing.You can go and see some pop concerts up at the Milton Keynes Bowl.They do not have that many groups in the Bowl but on the last Saturday night there was a concert held there, the main group was U2. You can also go up to Willen Lake. It is abig lake for water sports.This month ,July, a big new hotel has just been opened.Ther are also a lot of parks up that way. There are 3 leisure centres in Milton Keynes at the moment.The one nearest to where I live is the one at Bletchley.We have alovely shopping centre up near Central Milton Keynes. C. Cassidy Aged 12 Yrs.
